card.name: 197 E. Pickman Street
card.text: May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: A Heroic Rescue
card.text: A STEADFAST AUTHOR, friend and ally of yours, has been abducted by agents of the Mythos. Gathering your friends, you know you can rely on the REPORTER, the DOCTOR, the PRIVATE EYE, and the WIFE. The CORRUPT CULTIST has his lair in a CEMETERY, where you corner him with a WEAPON and capture his terrible TOME.

card.name: Abigail Winthrop Marsh
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card while any other Marsh card is in play as an Ally.

card.name: Adventurous Dilettante
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard up to two cards and replace them with new cards drawn from your Mythos Deck.

attr.value: Steadfast M.U. Professor, Knows English, Latin & Greek

card.name: Albert Shiny
card.text: Does not use Weapons. While this card is in play, you may Discard any Shoggoth that attacks your Investigator at the moment that it is revealed. At the end of that Round, Bury poor Albert in your Story Deck.

card.name: Ammi Pierce
card.text: While he is in play, add one to the Maximum number of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Cumulative with other Allies that raise your Maximum.

card.name: Amnesia
card.text: Randomly choose one card from your opponent's Hand that he or she must Discard, then Bury this card.

card.name: An Unexpected Calamity
card.text: Play this card and announce "Pass." This Pass ends the current Round, even if it is the only Pass in the Round.

card.name: Ann White
card.text: Add 1 point to this card's value when either Rhoby Harris or Mercy Dexter is in play.

card.name: Arkham Advertiser, The
card.text: All Reporters add 1 point to their card value when this card is your current Location on your Story Deck.

card.name: Arkham Sanitarium
card.text: Reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. If it is a Monster, it attacks immediately. Allies may defend you, then Discard it. Discard any other card drawn. You may remain here for one turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Arthur Munroe
card.text: While this card is in play, subtract one from the Minimum number of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Not cumulative with other Allies that lower your Minimum.

card.name: Asenath Waite Derby
card.text: Cannot be played if you have Ephraim Waite in play. Can know any one Spell. Bury Spell in your Story Deck after it is cast.

attr.value: Corrupt Wife, Living Dead, Knows English

card.name: Asylum for the Deranged
card.text: Reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. If it is a Monster, it attacks you immediately. Allies may defend you, then Discard it. Discard any other cards drawn. You may remain here for one turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Bacteriophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if you or your Allies have a Weapon, Tome, or Artifact when this card is played, and each time you play an Artifact, Tome or Weapon card.

card.name: Barnabas Marsh
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones.

card.name: Barrier of Naach-Tith
card.text: Reduce the value of Lesser or Greater Independent Monsters in target Threat by 2 points per card.

card.name: Beatrice Is Released From the Attic
card.text: Choose one Ally up to 4 points in value (including Weapon) that your opponent must Bury, then Bury this card.

card.name: Birds & Byakhees, The
card.text: Many strange and unusual species inhabit the surrounding terrain. Your job is to study them. Arising at the DAWN OF A NEW DAY, you travel to TWO different WATER Locations to meet an ALLY of the opposite sex as your Investigator. Together you travel to TWO different FOREST/COUNTRY LOCATIONS to go MONSTER watching. Bring your journal back to any PRESS LOCATION or SOCIETY LOCATION.

card.name: Black Binding
card.text: Target Ally must participate in any Combat this Round.

card.name: Book of Dzyan
card.text: Can also find one Yellow Sign Spell in this Tome if Aldebaran Moves in the Sky is in play.

card.name: Brazen Head, The
card.text: Can know any one Spell. Bury Spell in your Story Desk after it is cast. Knows Greek, Latin & Chinese.

card.name: Brown University John Hay Library
card.text: All Professors and Students add 1 point to their card value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Call of Cthulhu
card.text: "Re-roll" your Investigator. As your turn and while a Waning Moon is in play, Discard this card (plus any spell) and exchange your Investigator Card for another. The Education value on the new card may not be the same as that of another Investigator already in play. Current Sanity points do not change.

card.name: Car
card.text: Immediately play a new Location in the same Region right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Catastrophic Failure
card.text: The Weapon held by one Ally malfunctions catastrophically and dramatically. Bury the target Ally and Discard his or her Weapon.

card.name: Chant of Thoth
card.text: Immediately Discard up to four cards and replace them with an equal number of new cards drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Charles Dexter Ward
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card while you have any Corrupt Cultist in play as an Ally.

card.name: Children Have Nightmares
card.text: All Allies of one opponent are reduced by 2 points for the remainder of this Round, to a minimum of 1. Bury this card at the end of the Round.

card.name: Chime of Tezchaptl
card.text: Flip this card face-down to cancel an opponent's Spell that was just cast.

card.name: Christchurch Cemetery
card.text: Remain here for a Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Christchurch Cemetery
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Church of Starry Wisdom
card.text: May use this Gate more than once when Aldebaran or another star is in play, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use. You may remain here for one turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Circles of Thaol
card.text: Summon or Control a Lesser Independent Monster. If used while the Star Stone of Mnar is in play, you may summon or Control a Greater Independent as well.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if you are currently at an inside Location and at the beginning of each Turn that you are Inside.

card.name: Cleric of Fading Faith
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Cloud Memory
card.text: Bury all Phobias affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Colour Out of Space
card.text: Decide if this entity is Visible (6 value) or Invisble (4 value) at the moment of revealing. Remain thus for the duration of this Combat. Half strength in Direct Sunlight.

card.name: Conanicut Island Private Hospital
card.text: Gain 5 Sanity points now, but you must spend next Turn in therapy (playing no cards, and not Passing). You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia

card.name: Crawford Tillinghast
card.text: You may place an Artifact card beneath this card on your Turn in any Location. If this card is Discarded or Buried, the Artifact suffers the same fate. The Artifact can be replaced with another, if lost.

card.name: Cthaat Aquadingen
card.text: While this Tome is in play, increase the total value of your Threat by 1 point if Deep Ones, Father Dagon, or Mother Hydra are part of your Threat.

card.name: Cultes Des Goules
card.text: While this Tome is in play, increase the total value of your Threat by 1 point if any Living Dead are a part of it.

card.name: Curious Parcel, The
card.text: Old, eccentric Uncle Eliott has done it this time. Now he's disappeared, and is presumed dead by the authorities. But wait... a package today has been delivered to you! Find a TOME in a language other than English. Learn at least ONE SPELL in that Tome. Travel to ONE LIBRARY, ONE CEMETERY, and a GATE LOCATION (3 cards). Finally meet TWO ALLIES that are either AUTHORS, SCHOLARS, PROFESSORS, or ARTISTS.

card.name: Curse of the Rat-Thing
card.text: Your opponent's Investigator is now also affected by all Phobias he or she has put in play, for the remainder of the Round.

card.name: Dawn of a New Day
card.text: Bury any Night or Day Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Deep One
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Water Location. Add 1 point (cumulative) if your Investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones. Joins Father Dagon, Mother Hydra, Deep Ones and Shoggoths.

card.name: Demophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point each time you play an Ally card, by whatever means, alongside your Investigator.

card.name: Dendrophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if you are currently at a Forest Location and at the beginning of each Turn that you are in a Forest Location.

card.name: Direct Sunlight
card.text: It is now Day. Bury any Night or Day Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Discover Secret Cache
card.text: Immediately play an Artifact or a Tome card regardless of current Location's attributes. You or your Allies must still know the proper Languages, if needed. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Dr. Marinus Bicknell Willett
card.text: This Doctor and one Ally of your choice are excluded when determining the results of an Epidemic.

card.name: Drought
card.text: No Location bears the Water symbol while this card is in play. Bury any Storm Events in play. Bury this card if any Storm Event is played.

card.name: Dynamite
card.text: Add 6 points to Ally's value. One weapon per Ally. If Ally is Buried, also Bury this card. Discard both Dynamite and Ally after use in Combat.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: Take the top card of your opponent's Story Deck, and Bury it. If card revealed is not a Location, Bury it also. Repeat until a Location is revealed. Ignore Sanity gain/loss; may use Gate. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Eclipse of the Sun
card.text: Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Edward Pickman Derby
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card while you have Asenath Waite Derby in play.

card.name: Elder Things
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Water Location. Elder Things bypass Combat with all Monsters in your opponent's Threat except Shoggoths, and are never Buried in your Story Deck. Discard them after Combat. Joins Elder Things.

card.name: Elephant Gun
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's value. One Weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, this card also suffers the same fate.

card.name: Enchanted Cane
card.text: Increase your Investigator's maximum Sanity by five while this card is in play. If this card is Discarded or Buried, Sanity points above your maximum are immediately lost.

card.name: Eosophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if it is Day and each time a Day Event is played.

card.name: Ephraim Waite
card.text: Cannot be played if you have Asenath Waite Derby in play. When you bury Ephraim, you may immediately play Asenath Waite Derby card. Can know any one Spell. Bury Spell in your Story Deck after it is cast.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist, Living Dead, Knows English

card.name: Esoteric Order of Dagon
card.text: May use this Gate more than once when any Storm is in play, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use. You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Faith Baptist Church
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Father Dagon
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your Investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones. Joins Mother Hydra, Deep Ones and Shoggoths.

card.name: Fire Vampires
card.text: Add 1 point to this card's value if your opponent is in a Forest Location. Invisible during the Day. Joins Fire Vampires.

card.name: First Baptist Church
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Flee to Special Room
card.text: Cancel the effects of a card played since your last Turn that would otherwise cause you to Bury or Discard an Ally or Allies. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Flying Polyp
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if any Invisible Monsters are in opposing Threat. Bury this card if revealed when Direct Sunlight is in play.

card.name: Formless Spawn
card.text: Increase this card's value by 1 point for each other Formless Spawn in play in the same Threat at the time that Combat is resolved. Joins other Formless Spawn.

card.name: Full Moon
card.text: Bury any Day Event or any other Night Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: George Birch
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card while your current Location is a Cemetery.

card.name: Ghasts
card.text: Bury this card if Direct Sunlight is in play at the moment thst it is revealed. Joins Ghasts.

card.name: Ghatanathoa
card.text: Each Investigator flips face-down one random Ally at the beginning of each Turn due to the petrifying nature of this entity's visage. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Ghoul
card.text: Add 1 pooint to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Cemetery. Joins other Ghouls.

card.name: Giant Albino Penguins
card.text: At the time of playing this card choose the Sanity point loss, from 0 to -2 points. Joins with any other Monster card.

card.name: Gnoph Keh
card.text: Generates a freezing cold. Randomly choose and bury one Defending Ally when Threat is revealed.

card.name: Goody Fowler's Ghost
card.text: Invisible, Goody Fowler also Bypasses Combat with your opponent's Threat. Joins other Living Dead.

card.name: Great Epidemic, The
card.text: That year, a terrible plague fell on Arkham. Assisting the DOCTOR, you struggle THREE DAYS against the worst TYPHOID EPIDEMIC in memory. You marvel at the skill of one student in particular, HERBERT WEST, who works tirelessly, often late into the NIGHT. Many in town die, including the DOCTOR (he must be in your Story Deck). Later, a mad ZOMBIE-thing runs amok and kills several people. It is now incarcerated at a SANITARIUM.

card.name: Hands of Colubra
card.text: Increase the value of one Ally by 2 points for the remainder of this Round.

card.name: Harvey Reginald Opens Fire
card.text: Bury opponent's Ally of up to 2 points (excluding the value of any Weapons). Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Harvey Walters
card.text: While this card is in play, subtract one from the Minimum number of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Not cumulative with other Allies that lower your Minimum.

card.name: Hound of the Tindalos
card.text: Can only be used against Allies who are Inside. Bury any Ally of your opponent. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Howard Lovecraft
card.text: Remain in any Providence Location with Lovecraft for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: Bury Travel by Air or Sea cards on top of any Story Deck (return to former Location). Ignore sanity/loss gain; no Gate use. Neither may be played. Every Location now bears the Water Attribute. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Hydrophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if you are currently in a Water Location and at the beginning of each Turn that you are in a Water Location.

card.name: Iatrophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point at the beginning of each turn that a Sanitarium is the top card of your Story Deck. You may not remove this Phobia in a Sanitarium.

card.name: In the Nick of Time
card.text: Play this card, and the Pass by a player on an earlier Turn is voidedno Passes have been announced for the the current Round. You may immediately play a second card.

card.name: Influenza
card.text: Randomly choose one Ally that opponent must Bury. Each other player's Investigator also in the same Region must also randomly Bury one Ally. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Innsmouth Courier
card.text: All Reporters add 1 point to their value when this card is your current Location on your Story Deck.

card.name: Innsmouth Look, The
card.text: Move opponent's Ally to his or her Threat, face down. Ally functions as a Lesser Independent Monster for the remainder of this Round. Bury that Ally after Combat is concluded. Bury this card once the ally has been moved.

card.name: Instability in the Mythos
card.text: If the target Threat contains more than three cards, including any Great Old One or Outer Gods, randomly Discard three. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Instability in the Mythos
card.text: If the target Threat contains more than three cards, randomly choose two cards and add them to your Threat as if you summoned them (place crosswise). Bury them in your opponent's Story Deck at the end of Combat. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Interesting Shop, The
card.text: Spend the day traveling about town searching for that just-right knick-knack to adorn your mantle. Visit 4 different CITY LOCATIONS where you might find an ARTIFACT or TOME and find one thing that costs you at least 1 sanity point.

card.name: Ithaqua
card.text: Due to the intense cold and the blinding snow, lose 1 Sanity point each time you play a Travel card or when you alter a Location Card's orientation. (You are safer in a city.) No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Jeremiah Brewster
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones.

card.name: Jewelry of the Deep Ones
card.text: Incease the card value of all Deep Ones, Father Dagon, Mother Hydra, and certain Corrupt Cultists by 1 point.

card.name: K.J. Hooper
card.text: Protection from Police Investigation and from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment when you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may choose to Bury this card instead. Your opponent must then Bury his or her card.

card.name: Keenness of Two Alike
card.text: Cast this spell upon an Ally in your Hand. Ally may be immediately played, even during Combat, but you must be legally able to play that Ally card in your current Region.

card.name: Knee-Deep in Doom
card.text: Many of the Mythos tales feature a poor unfortunate fellow who, despite the best of intentions and regardless of merit, is wholly consumed by the horrors from beyond. Before your Sanity runs out, you must have discovered physical proof of the existence of the Mythos (20 POINTS-WORTH OF MONSTERS in your Story Deck).

card.name: Lonely House in the Woods, The
Lowell Street Cafe, The
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Marsh Mansion, The
card.text: All Marshes add 1 point to their card value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Marsh Refining Co.
card.text: All Marshes add 1 to their card value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Martense Kin
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if your Investigator is in any Catskills Location or if any Night card is in play. Joins other Martense Kin.

card.name: Martense Mansion
card.text: All Martense family members (including Martense Kin) add 1 point to the card value when this is your current Location.

card.name: Massachusetts State Hospital
card.text: Gain 4 Sanity points, but reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. Apply any Sanity gain or loss indicated on the card, then Discard it. You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Mercy Dexter
card.text: Add 1 point to this card's Value when either Rhoby Harris or Ann White is in play.

card.name: Mi-Go
card.text: Each Mi-Go surviving to affect your opponent's Allies or Investigator also steals one chosen Artifact. Your opponent must Bury the card in his or her Story Deck. Joins Mi-Go.

card.name: Mi-Go Braincase
card.text: Place this Artifact with an Ally. That Ally can now know one Spell. Bury Spell when cast. If this Artifact is Discarded or Buried, the Spell suffers the same fate.

card.name: Mist Projector
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's value; Ally is now Corrupt. One weapon per Ally. If Ally is lost, also lose this card.

card.name: Monophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point each time you lose an Ally.

card.name: Morose Veteran of the Great War
Mother Hydra
card.text: Add one to the value of this card if your Investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones. Joins Father Dagon, Deep Ones and Shoggoths.

card.name: New Moon
card.text: No effect on Day Events, but if none are in play then it is Day. Bury Night Events. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Nightgaunts
card.text: Each Nightgaunt surviving to affect your opponent's Allies or Investigator also carries off one random defending Ally. Discard such Allies. Joins other Nightgaunts.

card.name: Nyarlathotep
card.text: Spells no longer cost Sanity points to cast while this card is in play. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Nyhargo Dirge
card.text: Bury one Living Dead Monster or Ally in opponent's Threat.

attr.value: Affects One Ally or Monster Card

card.name: Obsessive/Compulsive
card.text: At the beginning of each Round, lose 1 Sanity point and reshuffle your Mythos Deck and all discards.

card.name: On The Edge
card.text: Ah! The brink of Insanity can bring enlightenment. Find a way to drive your own SANITY below SIX POINTS. Of course, they then carry you off to the SANITARIUM. The DOCTOR there, a CORRUPT CULTIST in disguise, chooses your for his diabolical experiments. First he tries to induce TWO different PHOBIAS. Then, using the instructions in his CALL OF CTHULHU TOME, he "REROLLS" YOUR INVESTIGATOR.

card.name: One Dark and Stormy Night
card.text: It just seems that things always go from bad to worse. During a POWERFUL STORM, travel to THREE different LOCATIONS along the MISCATONIC VALLEY, using at least ONE TRAVEL BY CAR and finding refuge in a nearby CHURCH.

card.name: Outsider, The
card.text: A eerie CORRUPT CULTIST moved into the HOUSE with a Gate at the edge of town. You spied him hauling THREE ARTIFACTS or TOMES into the storied place by the light of the WAXING MOON. Rushing back to the BUSINESS, the TOWNSFOLK RIOT in response to your warning, interrupting his foul ritual IN THE NICK OF TIME.

card.name: Pack of Rat Things
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your opponent is in any Inside Location. Joins other Rat Things.

card.name: Paracelsus' Sword
card.text: Add 2 points to Ally's value. One Weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, this sword suffers the same fate.

card.name: Pipes of Madness
card.text: During the Day; Bury opponent's 1 point Ally. At Night Bury opponent's Ally of up to 2 points. During the Full Moon Bury opponent's Ally of up to 3 points.

card.name: Police Investigation
card.text: At the beginning of the next Round, the local police confiscate four cards from opponent's hand. Opponent draws four cards fewer than usual. Bury this card at the end of the Round.

card.name: Powerful Storms
card.text: Bury Travel By Air cards on top of any Story Deck (return to former Location). Ignore Sanity loss/gain; no Gate use. No Travel By Air cards may be played while this card is in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Pragmatic Hobo
card.text: At the beginning of each turn, draw ("beg") one card from your Mythos Deck. You may not Pass (to try to end the Round). You must play or you must discard one card.

card.name: Randolph Carter
card.text: As long as he is chosen as a defending Ally, he raises the card value of all other Steadfast defending Allies by one point per card. Not cumulative with another Ally's Command Ability.

card.name: Raymond Legrasse
card.text: Protection from Police Investigation and from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment when you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may choose to Bury this card instead. Your opponent must then Bury his or her card.

attr.value: Steadfast Police Detective, Knows English & French

card.name: Respected New England Doctor
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Rhabdophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point any time that any player plays a card that begins a new Threat (not that is added to an existing Threat).

card.name: Rhan Tegoth
card.text: No Allies are Buried or Discarded while this card is in play. Instead, they become Living Dead. Place two pennies on each Living Dead card. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Rhoby Harris
card.text: Add 1 point to this card's value when either Mercy Dexter or Ann White is in play.

card.name: Ring of Eibon
card.text: Spend 2 Sanity points to gain a 13-second glance at one opponent's hand and choose their next legal play (cannot be a Pass) of a card from their hand to the table. Flip this card face-down after use.

card.name: Robert Marsh
card.text: Add one to the value of this card if your investigator has the Jewelry of the Deep Ones.

card.name: Scotophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point if it is Night, and each time a Night Event is played.

card.name: Seal of Isis
card.text: Protects against theft. If opponent plays a card that would cause you to lose an Artifact, Tome, or Spell from a Tome, you may choose to Bury this card instead. Opponent also immediately Buries card used.

card.name: Sefton Asylum
card.text: Your Electro-Shock Therapy is a success. Set aside this card and shuffle Story Deck. Randomly Discard one Story Deck card, then replace this card. You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Serpent People
card.text: Joins other Serpent People, and with Weapons.

card.name: Shantaks
card.text: Card value is 2 if Nightgaunts are part of your opponent's Threat. If Controlled, use Shantak as a Travel Card (Air or Water) to any Location including Space, except Underground.

card.name: Shining Trapezohedron
card.text: Can be used in the place of any one of the cards needed to play a Great Old One or an Outer God. Bury this card when used.

card.name: Shoggoth
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if your opponent's Threat includes Elder Things. Joins Deep Ones, Father Dagon & Mother Hydra.

card.name: Shotgun
card.text: Add 2 points to Ally's value. One Weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, this shotgun suffers the same fate.

card.name: Shrivelling
card.text: Target Ally weakens and loses 2 points of value ta a 1 point minimum, until the end of Combat. Bury any Artifact held by that Ally.

card.name: Sign of Eibon
card.text: Bury one random Monster card from one player's Threat.

card.name: Sign of Kish
card.text: Reduce the attack of each Lesser Servitor in all Threats attacking your Investigator by 2 points.

card.name: Skeletons
card.text: Skeletons Bypass Combat with all cards in your opponent's Threat. Add 1 point to their value at Night, or if either you or your opponent is in a Cemetery. Joins other Living Dead.

card.name: Sphere of Nath
card.text: Take the top card of your opponent's Story Deck, and Discard it. If card revealed is not a Location, bury it. Repeat until a Location card is revealed. Ignore Sanity gain/loss; may use Gate. Then, bury this card.

card.name: Staid University Professor
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Stand Against the Order
card.text: You and two STEADFAST ALLIES are (at first) greatly impressed by the strange magnetic charisma of BARNABAS MARSH, JEREMIAH BREWSTER and ROBERT MARSH (two of these three), leaders of the Order. You soon notice evidence of the INNSMOUTH LOOK among their followers. Stealthy investigation of the MARSH MANSION and the MARSH REFINERY reveals convincing evidence of their terrible customs and foul plot for humankind. In a desperate attempt to rid the world of this menace, you DYNAMITE the ESOTERIC ORDER OF DAGON.

card.name: Star Stone of Mnar
card.text: Designate one Threat to be affected before Monsters are revealed. Halves the attack from Lesser Servitors and Lesser Independents.

card.name: Theron-Marks Society, The
card.text: You are not alone. The Theron-Marks Society believes your wild stories of a MONSTER. We'll help you take care of that PHOBIA, as well. Our members will examine that odd TOME with that supposed SPELL that you found in the COUNTRY HOUSE. When you are feeling better, you and those TWO STEADFAST ALLIES are welcome to return as proud members of the Theron-Marks Society. One final thingbring a WEAPON.

card.name: Thieves in your Attic
card.text: Randomly select one Artifact card (not a Tome) that your opponent must Bury, then Bury this card.

card.name: Thurston's Tavern
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia

card.name: Tommygun
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's value; Ally is now Corrupt. One weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, this Weapon suffers the same fate.

card.name: Townsfolk Riot
card.text: Your opponent's foul deeds are exposed. Even if already Walking, opponent must play a Travel Event or a new Location next Turn or suffer an attack worth 5 points. Allies may defend. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Train
card.text: On a following Turn, play a new Location in the same Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck. Or, remain on the Train for a Turn to play any Ally card that could be played in this Region (only 1 Ally per Train card played).

card.name: Triskaidekaphobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point at the beginning of each Turn that the cards in your hand number 13.

card.name: Typhoid
card.text: Randomly choose and Bury half (round up) of your opponent's Allies. Any other players whose Investigators are in the same City as target are similary affected.

card.name: Ultra-Violet, The
card.text: While in play, this card makes all Invisible monsters in any attacking Threat Visible, but adds 1 point to the card value of each affected Monster.

card.name: Unaussprechlichen Kulten
card.text: While this Tome is in play and if your Threat includes Living Dead, increase the value of your Threat by one.

card.name: Unfortunate Nephew, The
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Vampire
card.text: Invisible. Add 1 to the value of this card at Night. Discard this card if Direct Sunlight is in play when it is revealed. Joins other Living Dead.

card.name: Voorish Sign
card.text: After casting, you may immediately transfer one or more Spells from one Tome to another, and from or to any Allies who can know a Spell. Spell icons for Tomes and Spells must match. Spells can not be transferred from or to your hand.

card.name: Waite House, The
card.text: All Waites add 1 to their value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Waning Moon
card.text: Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Wave of Oblivion
card.text: Take the top card of your opponent's Story Deck and Discard it. If card revealed is not a Location, bury it. Repeat until a Location card is revealed. Ignore Sanity gain/loss; may use Gate.

card.name: Waxing Moon
card.text: Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Wrack
card.text: Flip one Ally card face down.

card.name: Yithian Mental Contact
card.text: Your opponent changes his or her mind and Buries the card(s) that were just played or whose orientations were altered, except Adventure cards. Ignore any effects that those card(s) might otherwise have had.

card.name: Your First Big Story
card.text: The local newspaper wants your story! To get this story published, you must include the following elements that show a disturbing trend: search for evidence in THREE GATE LOCATIONS located in tree different cities or towns; have known an ALLY that costs you Sanity; discover a TOME or ARTIFACT as evidence, and get back to a PRESS LOCATION while it is DAY.

card.name: Zadok Allen
card.text: While this card is in play, add one to the Maximum numbers of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Cumulative with other Allies that raise your Maximum.

card.name: Zombies
card.text: Bury if revealed when Dawn of a New Day is in play. Add 1 to the value of this card at Night, or if either you or opponent is in a Cemetery. Instead of Burying it, begin the next Round with one Zombie card in your Threat if Allies were lost in Combat. Joins other Living Dead.
